info.description: Swagger (OpenAPI) Spec of all Flamingo Commerce modules
info.title: Flamingo Commerce API Spec

delete.summary: cleans the cart and returns the cleaned cart

post.description: Use this if you have one user input and that input can be used to either enter a voucher or a giftcart

parameters.description: the couponCode that should be applied as giftcart or voucher
parameters.name: couponCode

parameters.description: the couponCode that should be applied as giftcart
parameters.name: couponCode

parameters.description: the couponCode that should be applied
parameters.name: couponCode

post.description: Data need to be posted as application/x-www-form-urlencoded. Valid fields are all fields in "AddressForm" type. E.g. "firstname=max&lastname=mustermann&mail=max@example.org"

delete.summary: cleans the given delivery from the cart

parameters.description: the idendifier for the delivery in the cart
parameters.name: deliveryCode

parameters.description: the idendifier for the delivery in the cart
parameters.name: deliveryCode

parameters.description: the product idendifier that should be added
parameters.name: marketplaceCode

parameters.description: optional the product idendifier of the variant (for configurable products) that should be added
parameters.name: variantMarketplaceCode

parameters.description: optional the qty that should be added
parameters.name: qty

parameters.description: the couponCode that should be deleted as giftcart
parameters.name: couponCode

parameters.description: the couponCode that should be applied
parameters.name: couponCode

get.summary: Get the payment status of current cart (or last placed cart)

parameters.description: the marketplace code (idendifier) for the product
parameters.name: marketplacecode

reservedOrderID.description: ReservedOrderID is an ID already known by the Cart of the future order ID

applied.description: how much of the discount has been subtracted from cart price, IMPORTANT: always negative

campaignCode.description: unique code of the underlying campaign or rule e.g. "summer-campaign-2018"

couponCode.description: code of discount e.g. provided by user "summer2018"

isItemRelated.description: flag indicating if the discount is applied due to item in cart

label.description: readable name of discount "Super Summer Sale 2018"

sortOrder.description: indicates in which order discount have been applied, low value has been applied before high value

applied.description: how much of the gift card has been subtracted from cart price

remaining.description: how much of the gift card is still available

additionalData.description: AdditionalData   can be used for Custom attributes

belongsToAuthenticatedUser.description: BelongsToAuthenticatedUser - false = Guest Cart true = cart from the authenticated user

billingAddress.description: BillingAddress - the main billing address (relevant for all payments/invoices)

deliveries.description: Deliveries - list of desired Deliveries (or Shipments) involved in this cart

entityID.description: EntityID is a second identifier that may be used by some backends

id.description: ID is the main identifier of the cart

paymentSelection.description: PaymentSelection - the saved PaymentSelection (saves "how" the customer want to pay)

purchaser.description: Purchaser - additional infos for the legal contact person in this order

customAttributes.description: CustomAttributes can hold additional data for coupon code - keys and values are project specific

deliveryInfo.description: DeliveryInfo - The details for this delivery - normally completed during checkout

shippingItem.description: ShippingItem	- The Shipping Costs that may be involved in this delivery

additionalData.description: AdditionalData  - Possibility for key value based information on the delivery - can be used flexible by each project

carrier.description: Carrier - Optional the name of the Carrier that should be responsible for executing the delivery

code.description:
Code - is a project specific identifier for the Delivery - you need it for the AddToCart Request for example
The code can follow the convention in the Readme: Type_Method_LocationType_LocationCode

deliveryLocation.description: DeliveryLocation The target Location for the delivery

desiredTime.description: DesiredTime - Optional - the desired time of the delivery

method.description: Method - The shippingmethod something that is project specific and that can mean different delivery qualities with different deliverycosts

workflow.description: Type - The Type of the Delivery - e.g. delivery or pickup - this might trigger different workflows

code.description: Code - optional identifier of this location/destination - is used in special destination Types

type.description: Type - the type of the delivery - use some of the constant defined in the package like DeliverylocationTypeAddress

useBillingAddress.description: UseBillingAddress - the address should be taken from billing (only relevant for type address)

appliedDiscounts.description: AppliedDiscounts contains the details about the discounts applied to this item - they can be "itemrelated" or not

externalReference.description:
ExternalReference can be used by cart service implementations to separate the representation in an external
cart service from the unique item ID

id.description: ID of the item - needs to be unique over the whole cart

singlePriceNet.description: SinglePriceNet net price for single product

sourceID.description: Source Id of where the items should be initial picked - This is set by the SourcingLogic

variantMarketPlaceCode.description: VariantMarketPlaceCode is used for Configurable products

existingCustomerData.description: ExistingCustomerData if the current purchaser is an existing customer - this contains infos about existing customer

error.description: Contains details if success is false

code.description: Code the idendifier of the Category

name.description: Name - speaking name of the category

path.description: The Path (root to leaf) for this Category - separated by "/"

displayData.description: DisplayData holds data, normally HTML to be displayed to the user

url.description: URL is used to pass URL data to the user if the current state needs some

action.description: Action to perform to proceed in the payment flow. If status is "payment_waiting_for_customer" this field contains information about what to do - e.g. "redirect" or "show_iframe"

data.description: Data contains additional information related to the action / flow

error.description: Error contains additional information in case of an error (e.g. payment failed)

status.description: Status of the payment flow. E.g. "payment_completed", "payment_waiting_for_customer" or "payment_failed"

type.description: Type - Name( or Type) of the Loyalty program

loyaltyEarnings.description: LoyaltyEarnings optional infos about potential loyalty earnings

loyaltyPrices.description: LoyaltyPrices - Optional infos for products that can be paid in a loyalty program

marketPlaceCode.description: The sku that should be used to link from Teasers

preSelectedVariantSku.description: PreSelectedVariantSku - might be set for configurables to give a hint to link to a variant of a configurable (That might be the case if a user filters for an attribute and in the teaser the variant with that attribute is shown)

teaserLoyaltyEarningInfo.description: TeaserLoyaltyEarning optional teaser for the loyalty earning used in grid / list view

teaserLoyaltyPriceInfo.description: TeaserLoyaltyPriceInfo - optional the Loyaltyprice that can be used for teaser (e.g. on listing views)

teaserPrice.description: TeaserPrice is the price that should be shown in teasers (listview)

teaserPriceIsFromPrice.description: TeaserPriceIsFromPrice - is set to true in cases where a product might have different prices (e.g. configurable)

tags.description: This Cart APIs are most suitable to be called from a browser, because they rely on the session and cookie headers.
tags.name: v1 Cart ajax API

tags.description: This Payment APIs are most suitable to be called from a browser, because they rely on the session and cookie headers.
tags.name: v1 Payment ajax API
